body_html:
@sicnarf1a I ran the above code snippet and received consistent output every time, i.e. a gradient of 1. tf.fake_quant_with_min_max_vars works as expected, not producing the error you are getting.
Please describe under what condition you would get different results.

body:
@sicnarf1a I ran the above code snippet and received consistent output every time, i.e. a gradient of 1. `tf.fake_quant_with_min_max_vars` works as expected, not producing the error you are getting. 
Please describe under what condition you would get different results.
